Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
motorized \motorized\ adj. 1. same as {motored}; as, a motorized wheelchair. Opposite of {unmotorized}. [Narrower terms: {bimotored ; {trimotored ]
Syn: motored. [WordNet 1.5]
2. Equipped with vehicles to permit rapid movement from place to place.
Syn: mechanized. [WordNet 1.5]
motorized adj 1: equipped with a motor or motors; "a motorized wheelchair" [syn: {motorised}, {motored}] [ant: {unmotorized}] 2: using vehicles; "motorized warfare" [syn: {mechanized}, {mechanised}]
